original_text:
You clothed me with skin and flesh,
    and knit me together with bones and sinews.
korean_text: 피부와 살을 내게 입히시며 뼈와 힘줄로 나를 엮으시고

sentences.original_text: You clothed me with skin and flesh
and knit me together with bones and sinews
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 뼈와 힘줄로 나를 엮어 만드셨습니다
